page.title: 07A FARMER'S YEAR IN GOOSTREY
page.content: When we went to Dromedary Lodge farm, Mr Simpson told us the main jobs for each month of the year.Sometimes the work has to be delayed because it is too wet.{ {January-}ploughing,machinery maintenance {February-}ploughing {March-}sowing spring barley & potatoes {April-}planting potatoes,applying fertiliser,sowing grass & fodder beet {May-}silage {June-}silage {July and August-}harvesting potatoes and corn. {September and October-}sowing winter barley. { {November-}harvesting fodder beet and ploughing {December-}ploughing and carting manure
